mapper.select:
select date_format(ar.`create_time`,"%Y-%m-%d") as date, count(ar.`id`) as count, count(case when ar.`hit` = 0 then ar.`hit` end) as miss_count from `api_req` ar left join `client` c on ar.`client_id` = c.`id` and ar.`hit` = 0
(c.`corp_name` like '%${keyword}%' or c.`short_name` like '%${keyword}%')
and ar.`product_id` = #{productId} and ar.`create_time` >= #{fromDate} and ar.`create_time` < #{toDate}
group by date_format(ar.`create_time`,"%Y-%m-%d") order by date_format(ar.`create_time`,"%Y-%m-%d") asc
